DataElement.preferredName: Person Recent Excision Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an indicator of yes/no/biopsy only related to person's recent resection as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Recent Excision Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to person's recent resection as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Recent Excision Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Near to or not long before the present.:The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ. :Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Near to or not long before the present.
The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Person Recent Excision Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an event, entity or condition determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied regarding recent resection as component to the trial-specific elgibility.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.: Not accompanied by another or others.: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

DataElement.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
